author: dkulp
msg: [XMLSCHEMA-20] Fix problem of serialized import elements always having
a targetNamespace attribute that may be empty.

author: dkulp
msg: [XMLSCHEMA-18] Don't set anything into the threadlocal if we don't need
to to avoid having anything hold onto it (or our classloader)

author: dkulp
msg: [XMLSCHEMA-23] Fix issues with namespace declarations not being
preserved on anything other than the top level element

author: dkulp
msg: [XMLSCHEMA-24] Update to use setAttributeNS instead of setAttribute

author: dkulp
msg: [XMLSCHEMA-22] Use the english locale for parsing enums to avoid issues
with local locals making the toUpperCase call not yield usable results.
